attributes.action: Punish the London August rioters caught with the full force of the law.
attributes.additional_details: Petitioning the government to take away the benefits of the rioters is a misinformed and reactionist notion that will not succeed. Instead, we should be asking the Ministry of Justice to ensure that the CPS is able to prosecute the rioters to the maximum extent of the law to act as an example for the future.
